txt.en: You have released an Orc from within the webs
Freed Rohirrim in the Creeping Wood ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Many Rohirrim have ventured within the Creeping Wood and never returned.

'The spiders of the Creeping Wood have covered the caves and tunnels with webs thick enough to catch even Orcs and Rohirrim. Several of our scouts who went in have not returned, and I fear that they are trapped within the spiders' nest.\n\n'Find our scouts and free them.'
Rohirrim can be found trapped within cocoons within the Creeping Wood.\n\nWaldeg asked you to venture into the Creeping Wood and see if you could rescue any trapped Rohirrim.
'I wish that you could have left the Orcs trapped within the webs, but I imagine it is hard to tell what is inside a cocoon before you slice it open.'
Waldeg is at Snowbourn.\n\nWaldeg will be pleased to hear that you have rescued several Rohirrim from the Creeping Wood.
'Be wary, the spiders of the Creeping Wood can approach from nearly any angle, even above and below.'\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>This is an instanced public questing area.</rgb>
Free Rohirrim in the Creeping Wood ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
<rgb=#FF0000>Completing Aiding the Eastemnet will cancel this quest</rgb>
